oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agribusiness and Innovation Systems in Africa
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: K. Larsen
R. Kim
F. Theus
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Links between innovation systems and value chains. Conceptual discussion and case studies in SSA (Ghana, Uganda, Tanzania, Kenya, different food crops). Valuable because the attempt to link innovation systems perspective and the value chain analysis. It touches the “cross” value chain issues, bur not quite clearly
